entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IL2026 Trim warning from Microsoft.Maui.Controls.SourceGen.CodeBehindGenerator #110168
  • Add access to name from HttpClientFactory callbacks #110167
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: allow collection expressions for 'ReadOnlyCollection<T>' #110161
    10.0.0
  • Change/Remove ClientWebSocket ping packet body #110158
  • Request to Add Logging for Configuration Events #110157
    Future
  • [mono] The type initializer for `System.Drawing.DrawingCom` threw an exception: Operation is not supported on this platform #110150
    10.0.0
  • [mono] Runtime tests `LargeStructSize_Mono` and `xprecise1_cs_do` failing on Apple mobile #110149
    10.0.0
  • Configuration binding does not throw when it should #110147
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: GC/Features/HeapExpansion/bestfit-finalize/bestfit-finalize.cmd #110134
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/stackoverflow/stackoverflowtester/stackoverflowtester.cmd #110133
  • Test failure: System.Data.Tests.DataSetTest2.ReadXmlSchema_Nested #110132
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Data.Tests.DataSetReadXmlSchemaTest.SingleElementTreatmentDifference #110131
  • Test failure: Tests.Integration.DelayLoadingTests.PartTypeLoadedLazilyLazyLoopLoadsLazily #110130
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: profiler/gc/gc/gc.cmd #110128
  • Blazor WASM produces larger biniries with dotnet 9 compared to dotnet 8, even with WasmStripILAfterAOT=true #110143

Closed

  • Memory corruption leading to Access Violation in .NET 9 using parallel reads on a Trie object #110088
  • HttpWebClient always send Cache-Control and Pragma headers when proxy used #110164
  • something.Where(predicate).FirstOrDefault() is faster than something.FirstOrDefault(predicate) #100378
    Future
  • Add an `ISet<T>.AsReadOnly()` extension method #29387
    Future
  • Matrix4x4.CreateReflection gives incorrect results in .NET 9 #110050
  • SPMI replay failure: Assertion failed 'instructionSetFlags.Equals(EnsureInstructionSetFlagsAreValid(instructionSetFlags)) during Pre-Import #110106
    10.0.0
  • In `SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData`: #110159
  • JIT: superpmi-replay failing on win-x64 with crashes #110145
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorEmitterTests.TestEmitter #110137
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorEmitterTests.TestBaseline_TestWithNestedClass_Success #110138
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.SourceGeneration.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBindingGeneratorTests.Collections #110139
  • How to implement gcc __attribute__((constructor)) when compiling dynamic libraries under Linux #110102
  • [browser][MT] Could not load file or assembly System.Runtime.InteropServices #106067
    10.0.0
  • System.Reflection.Emit doesn't work on linux and wsl ubuntu #110042
  • Test failure: LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests.NativeMarshallingAttributeAnalyzerTests.MarshallerWithNoEntryPointAttributes_ReportsDiagnostic #110136
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.InaccessibleValidationAttributesTest #110140
  • Test failure: ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests.ComClassGeneratorDiagnostics.NonPartialContainingTypeWarns #110135
  • `ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests` failing on release coreclr windows x86 Release #110151
    10.0.0
  • [mono] Attempting to JIT compile method (wrapper dynamic-method) void object:WriteArrayOfintToXml #110148
    10.0.0
  • Dependency changes when building a self contained application in SDK version 8.0.303 to 8.0.401 #108354
  • [android][infra] Flaky x64 Android failures in PayloadGroup0, failed to install mobile app #102646
    10.0.0
  • [mono][maccatalyst] Failures in System.IO.IsolatedStorage.Tests #101371
    10.0.0
  • [mono] Apple mobile runtime tests can't load BigArray_32_1 in ClassLoader tests, the size is too big. #106797
    10.0.0
  • [Apple][x64] `System.Tests.StringTests.EndsWithNoMatch_StringComparison` test failure #108832
    10.0.0
  • Unnecessary sign extension in `Vector512.Create(sbyte)` and `Vector512.Create(short)` #108820
    10.0.0
  • Source generator tests failing with NullReferenceException in TaskReplicator #110127
  • [metadata] Move MonoClass:inlinearray_value out of MonoClass #103913
    10.0.0
  • Performance regression on .NET 9.0 when creating AVX constants inside loops via System.Numerics.Vector #110125
  • [mono] Tests failed: System.Diagnostics.Tests.StackTraceTests.Ctor_Exception_SkipFrames* #31796
  • [mono] Test failed: System.Diagnostics.Tests.StackTraceTests.ToString_Invoke_ReturnsExpected #31797

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable more ILLink test cases with native AOT #110166
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Out of range exception on system without a WINS configuration #110165
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #110163
    Servicing-consider, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix Matrix4x4.CreateReflection when D is not zero #110162
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics
  • Arm64-PAC: Add encoding for pointer authentication (PAC) instructions #110160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] force memory views resize after loading assets and after VM start #110156
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [MT][Firefox] Exclude tests failing with "Could not load file or assembly 'xunit.assert` #110155
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • Limit OpenSSL TLS Session cache for client SSL_CTX instances #110154
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Allow hiding `UnmanagedCallersOnly` exports #110152
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [ppc64le] Fixed System.Runtime.Intrinsics tests failures #110126
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add numerical ordering option for string comparison operations #109861
    area-System.Globalization, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0-staging] Ignore modopts/modreqs for `UnsafeAccessor` field targets #109709
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.1
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #109996
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure proper cleanup of key files when not persisting them #109845
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • DATAS BGC thread synchronization fix #109804
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Added AsReadOnly() extension to ISet<T> #106037
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix Matrix4x4.CreateReflection when D is not zero #110057
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Add a missing = in BigInteger.cs #109732
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix regression in constructor parameter binding logic. #109813
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] `TensorPrimitives` XML docs: `MinNumber`/`ReciprocalSqrt`/`ReciprocalSqrtEstimate` oversights #109922
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 9.0.x
  • JIT: Remove some `fgRenumberBlocks` calls #110026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] JIT: Use ABI names for floating registers #109728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [Tests] Add more logging for runtime test timeouts #109998
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add LoongArch64 and RISC-V to list of ports #110144
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: call IsVNNeverNegative in IsNeverNegative #110118
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reapply "Fold "X relop 0" in assertprop" (#110129) #110142
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 131.0.6778.69, windows: 131.0.6778.70 #109895
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Fix loop index printing #110080
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Suppress IL3000 in MsQuicApi constructor #109965
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.x
  • JIT: implied Boolean range assertions for local prop #109481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove redundant sign/zero extension for SIMD broadcasts #108824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Fold "X relop 0" in assertprop" #110129
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move MonoClass:inlinearray_value out of MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2589452 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix UNC paths #110033
    area-Host
  • Update System.Speech to also recognize Speech_OneCore #110123
    area-System.Speech
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix hostfxr.h to be valid C again. #110060
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 9.0.1
  • Fix an issue with sysconf returning the wrong last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors #109567
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.12
  • Fix an issue with sysconf returning the wrong last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors. #109749
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • New GC decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Use the managed signer to remove the code signature from singlefile bundles #110063
    area-HostModel, 10.0.0
  • Stop using LINQ in Tensors #109415
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Fix System.Reflection.Emit `SetChecksum` creating invalid pdb #110097
    bug, area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [draft] Improve startup and warmup performance for invoke by reducing emit usage #109901
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #109920
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [mono][aot] Fix compilation crashes when type load exception is generated in code #110078
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Add global search option to 3-opt layout #110089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Remove dotnet9 nuget feeds #109149
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cDAC] Implement ReJIT portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #109936
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • SPMI: Switch back to unpinned 9.0 SDK for micro benchmarks #109992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transfer ThreadPool local queue to high-pri queue on Task blocking #109990
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 8.0.12
  • [release/9.0-staging] Transfer ThreadPool local queue to high-pri queue on Task blocking #109989
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 9.0.1
  • Clean up in LowerFusedMultiplyAdd #110113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Put Java JNI function in a separate static library #108513
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 131.0.6778.85, windows: 131.0.6778.86 #110114
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Use any reaching def for unreachable uses in incremental SSA builder #110077
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [WASIp2] soft debugger via sockets #109584
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Don't use a GVM in Linq Select with NAOT by default #109978
    area-System.Linq, size-reduction, community-contribution
  • Fixed missed case #110122
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
